problem.markdown:
Answer the following question by reviewing the data source for the dashboard objects (Hint: you may have to consider the source from formulas as well).
>>Where does the product's categories and segments data come from? (Select two that apply)<< [ ] SQL database [ ] Excel data model [x] Sales Worksheet [x] Products Worksheet [ ] Dashboard - CA Worksheet
[explanation] The product's categories and segments come from the Sales table in the Sales Worksheet. They are derived using VLOOKUP formula from the Products table in the Products Worksheet. [explanation]
